name: Ext_R5_Encounter_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Encounter.reason for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Encounter.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Encounter|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The list of medical reasons that are expected to be addressed during the episode of care
element.definition: `Encounter.reason` maps to R4B `Encounter.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Encounter.reason` maps to R4B `Encounter.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: What the reason value should be used for/as
element.definition: What the reason value should be used as e.g. Chief Complaint, Health Concern, Health Maintenance (including screening).
element.comment: `Encounter.reason` maps to R4B `Encounter.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Encounter.reason` maps to R4B `Encounter.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: What the reason value should be used for/as
element.definition: What the reason value should be used as e.g. Chief Complaint, Health Concern, Health Maintenance (including screening).
element.comment: `Encounter.reason` maps to R4B `Encounter.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Encounter.reason` maps to R4B `Encounter.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Reason the encounter takes place (core or reference)
element.definition: Reason the encounter takes place, expressed as a code or a reference to another resource. For admissions, this can be used for a coded admission diagnosis.
element.comment: `Encounter.reason` maps to R4B `Encounter.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Encounter.reason` maps to R4B `Encounter.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Reason the encounter takes place (core or reference)
element.definition: Reason the encounter takes place, expressed as a code or a reference to another resource. For admissions, this can be used for a coded admission diagnosis.
element.comment: `Encounter.reason` maps to R4B `Encounter.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Encounter.reason` maps to R4B `Encounter.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Reason why the encounter takes place.
